title: Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding
description: Bug 101187 - Localization key can't be blank when adding.
OB: When the key is blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
EB: In the properties file, if the key is left blank, it should still have a valid value. Expected result: the externalized text should be displayed in the chart title. Actual result: the externalized text cannot be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set externalized text in the chart title.
